mangaName: Jishou F-Rank no Oniisama ga Game de Hyouka sareru Gakuen no Chouten ni Kunrin suru Sou desu yo
alternativeNames:
Dear Self-styled F rank bro' says, he's gonna rule a game-oriented school.
My Dear Self-proclaimed F-rank brother might rule this school where your worth is determined by games
Брат фальшивого F-ранга собирается править в академии с геймерской оценкой потенциала.
自称Ｆランクのお兄さまがゲームで評価される学園の頂点に君臨するそうですよ？
author: Mikawa Ghost
genres: Ação, Comédia, Drama, Psicologico, Romance, Sci-Fi
themes: Harem, Vida escolar, Jogos Tradicionais, Ecchi
